participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Curious and playful, Lily enjoys exploring the world around her.
participant_1.background: i have a pet turtle. i like to play with my dolls. i don't pick up my toys. my best friend lives next door.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Creative and nurturing, Emma finds joy in baking and crafts.
participant_2.background: i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. i've a dogs.
